text: @maggieNYT Pandemic situation. People getting laid off. Small corporations closing doors forever. Democrats playing politics. These are evil people. WE WILL NOT FORGET. This deal was done before Pelosi flew in from California to kill it. Where was she when it was being negotiated. 😡
